Photos.Controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Photos.Controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminController, AlbumController, LoginController, PhotoController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that defines the functions for all the controllers in this application. All controllers SHOULD derive from this class. Handles scene changes, saving, loading, errors handling, etc.
    Author:
    Krysti Leong, April Dizon

    • Method Detail

      • initData

        protected abstract void initData(User currentUser,
                                 Album currentAlbum,
                                 Database db)
        Called before a scene is changed in changeScenes(). Pass and save data between the given scenes.
        Parameters:
        currentUser - Current user in this session, if any.
        currentAlbum - Current selected album in this session, if any.
        db - Current database of this session, if any.

      • setFields

        protected void setFields(User currentUser,
                         Album currentAlbum,
                         Database db)
        Set the given fields. Used in initData.
        Parameters:
        currentUser - User to pass.
        currentAlbum - Album to pass.
        db - Database to pass.

      • getDatabase

        protected DBStatus getDatabase()
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Get the database of the application. If the current database is null, create a new one and load data into it. If a database already exists, then return it. Should be called only once.
        Returns:
        Database of the application.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • handleExit

        protected void handleExit()
        Handle the exit function of this application. First saves the database, and then ends the application.

      • changeScene

        protected void changeScene(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                           java.lang.String fxmlFile)
        Change the scene by loading another .fxml file.
        Parameters:
        stage - Current stage?
        fxmlFile - .fxml file of the scene to load.

      • showSuccess

        protected void showSuccess(java.lang.String message)
        Display a success alert on the screen for the user.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display on the alert.

      • showError

        protected void showError(java.lang.String message)
        Display an error alert on the screen for the user.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display on the alert.

      • showWarning

        protected boolean showWarning(java.lang.String message)
        Display an warning alert on the screen for the user.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display on the alert.
        Returns:
        True if the user clicked YES, false elsewise.

      • removeWhitespaces

        public static java.lang.String removeWhitespaces(java.lang.String s)
        Utility function to remove whitespaces for a string. Used when collecting user input.
        Parameters:
        s - String
        Returns:
        Given string, with whitespaces removed.

      • handleDBStatus

        protected void handleDBStatus(DBStatus status)
        Show an error dialog depending on what the given DBstatus is.
        Parameters:
        status - Status to handle.
